value.text: Father, we pray for your holy Catholic Church;
value.response: That we all may be one.
That your Name may be glorified by all people.
value.text: Grant that every member of the Church may truly and humbly serve you;
We pray for all bishops, priests, and deacons;
value.response: That they may be faithful ministers of your Word and Sacraments.

value.text: We pray for all who govern and hold authority in the nations of the world;
value.response: That there may be justice and peace on the earth.
That our works may find favor in your sight.
value.text: Give us grace to do your will in all that we undertake;
Have compassion on those who suffer from any grief or trouble;
value.response: That they may be delivered from their distress.

value.text: Give to the departed eternal rest.
value.response: Let light perpetual shine upon them.
May we also come to share in your heavenly kingdom.
value.text: We praise you for your saints who have entered into joy;
Let us pray for our own needs and those of others.
